Text: RE CalPX Letter to Participants Cc B NonPrivilegedpst Please make sure Tom Lauria representing Mirant is included on your PXrelated emails Thank you Original Message From Howard JWeg mailto Sent Monday October PM To Subject CalPX Letter to Participants Attached is a copy of the letter sent out to all participants by the management at the CalPX We should discuss it during our meeting on Thursday Thanks

Mirant Contact InfoB NonPrivilegedpst Richard So that you have it Im sending all of my contact information to you Given the timetable feel free to use my cell or home numbers Zackary Starbird Managing Attorney Litigation Mirant Americas Inc Perimeter Center West Atlanta Georgia Ofc Fax Cell
